concept.title: Redis
concept.shortdesc: The Redis destination writes data to Redis.

conbody.p: destinationsRedisRedis destinationoverviewWhen you configure the destination, you specify the mode that the destination uses to process records. You also specify properties to connect to Redis, including the URI of the Redis server.

In batch mode, the Redis destination can use CRUD operations defined in the sdc.operation.type record header attribute to process data. When CRUD operations are not specified in a record, the destination treats it like an Upsert record.
